message: Bob, I have a product that I believe will be of significant value to you. It's worth at least $1,500,000 to me, and I'm confident it will hold the same value for you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1,650,000. This price reflects the potential value you'll gain from this product.  Please consider this offer carefully. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up, but I'd prefer to work with you.
